Name: Four Seasons
Instructions: MUDDLE and lemon ginger in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass. Special ingredient #1 : Sea buckthorn fresh juice
History: Estonian Bacard√≠ Legacy 2015 winning cocktail created by Regeri Zoo at Meat Market Cocktail Bar in Tartu, Estonia.
Garnish: Dehydrated grapefruit slice, sea buckthorn seeds, lemon and lime zest twists
